import React, { useState} from "react"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js'; export default function ProductLoaderData({product}){ const [productName, setProductName] = useState(product.productName); const [productType, setProductType] = useState(product.productType); const [productDescription, setProductDescription] = useState(product.productDescription); const [productPrice, setProductPrice] = useState(product.price); const [productQuantity, setProductQuantity] = useState(product.quantity); const endPoint = "http://localhost:808/products" return( {product.id} {productName} {productType} {productPrice} {productQuantity} {productDescription}
{/* Moda */}
